title: FDA says Covid-19 antigen tests may be less sensitive to Omicron variant, but they're still an important tool
content:
1. FDA says Covid-19 antigen tests may be less sensitive to Omicron variant, but they're still an important tool  CNN
  2. White House team reacts to FDA report on rapid COVID test sensitivity: PCR, antigen tests 'critical tools'  Fox News
  3. FDA: COVID-19 at-home tests might not detect omicron  11Alive
  4. Rapid COVID-19 tests worse at detecting Omicron: FDA lab data  Business Insider
  5. Fauci: At Home Tests May Be Less Sensitive To Omicron  erienewsnow.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: FDAは、Covid-19抗原検査はオミクロンの変種に対して感度が低いかもしれないが、依然として重要なツールであると述べている。
FDA称Covid-19抗原测试可能对Omicron变体不太敏感，但它们仍然是一个重要工具
FDA稱Covid-19抗原測試可能對Omicron變體不太敏感，但它們仍然是一個重要工具
